scripts.postversion: sed '/^.*"version":.*$/d' package.json > .package.json.without.version && echo $npm_package_version > .version && git rev-parse HEAD > .githash
scripts.build:docker: npm run postversion && VERSION=`echo $npm_package_version| sed 's/\.[0-9]*-SNAPSHOT.*$/-SNAPSHOT/'`; docker buildx build --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t cismet/$npm_package_name -t cismet/$npm_package_name:$VERSION .
scripts.publish:docker: npm run postversion && VERSION=`echo $npm_package_version| sed 's/\.[0-9]*-SNAPSHOT.*$/-SNAPSHOT/'`; docker buildx build --push --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t cismet/$npm_package_name -t cismet/$npm_package_name:$VERSION .
